data.title: Emilia Fox husband: Is Emilia Fox married? Who is Luc Chaudray?
data.meta_description: EMILIA FOX is known for her acting accolades, most recently in BBC Drama Silent Witness but is Emilia Fox married? Who is Luc Chaudray?
data.text:
Silent Witness: Emilia Fox discusses playing Dr. Nikki Alexander

Emilia Fox is the star of award-winning BBC crime drama series Silent Witness, playing Dr Nikki Alexander. She has portrayed the character since its eighth season in 2004. The series focuses on a team of experts in forensic pathology, who investigate various crimes.

Emilia Fox has starred in a mix of both television and film, appearing in The Pianist in 2002, Dorian Gray in 2009 and the Casual Vacancy in 2015.

She has also starred on Channel 4’s Celebrity Gogglebox commenting on the top TV shows of the week alongside her cousin Lawrence Fox.

Emilia is from London and was born in Hammersmith on July 31, 1974.

The 45-year-old has acting in her blood, her father being actor Edward Fox, and her mother actress Joanna David.

Read More: Silent Witness 2020 ending explained: What happened at the end?

Is Emilia Fox married? Who is Luc Chaudray?

Emilia married Mad Men actor Jared Harris in 2005, but the pair divorced in 2010.

She began dating actor Jeremy Gilley, and in November 2010 gave birth to a baby girl named Rose.

Emilia has also previously been linked to TV chef Marco Pierre White, but the Daily Mail reports the pair split in 2016.

Invalid email

Now she is reportedly in a relationship with millionaire Luc Chaudray.

A source has said the pair have told their family they wish to marry soon.

A source told The Sun: “Emilia and Luc are hopelessly in love.

“They’re both parents and looking forward to blending their families into one.

DON'T MISS

Silent Witness: Emilia Fox distracts viewers with new look [PICTURES]

Laurence Fox: Gogglebox star reveals how he got through Billie divorce [INSIGHT]

Laurence Fox: Celebrity Gogglebox star drools over Nigella Lawson [VIDEO]

"They’re desperate to start a family of their own too, but only once they are married.”

The Daily Mail reports Luc is a father to twin boys and works at the International Artists Management.

What is Emilia Fox known for?

The actress first began her career in 1995, starring as Georgiana Darcy - sister of Colin Firth’s Mr Darcy - in the television adaption of Pride and Prejudice.

Emilia has starred in a range of films including The Pianist (2002), Dorian Gray (2009), Ways to Live Forever (2010) and the upcoming Blithe Spirit.

On the small screen, she has appeared in David Copperfield (1999), Henry VIII (2003), Silent Witness (2004 to present) and The Trial of Christine Keeler (2020) among others.

She has also presented Jack the Ripper - The Case Reopened, narrated The Snow Wolf: A Winter’s Tale and starred on Celebrity Juice as a team captain.

On Sunday night, Emilia was back on screens as a studio guest on Top Gear alongside her cousin Laurence.

They joined presenters Paddy McGuinness, Freddie Flintoff and Chris Harris.

Also on Top Gear, Freddie and Chris tackled the toughest off-road race on the planet: the brutal Baja 1000.

Out on the track, there was a showdown between a Renault hot hatch, a Porsche sports car - and an old Lamborghini.

Laurence and Emilia Fox are the studio guests on Top Gear which can be watched again on BBC iPlayer
